review_title: Great position with lots of stress though
pros: The personnel you work with are really nice but there is an unspoken clique you'll want to belong to.
cons: Training is not their strong suit, you just have to catch on or be called into the office for discipline

pros: The small hospital atmosphere made for the feel of a close family.
cons: There was no flexibility within the 90 days of hire. I had to miss 3 days due to Covid and not having a sitter. I was only part-time so I could see where that might be a lot, however the same policy applies to full time employees. They brought me in and asked me if there was "something I needed to tell" them. I am fortunate enough that I could resign from my position as I did then very politely. This encounter gave me a bad impression and not sure that I would want to work for this company again. It could also be corporate policies that do not work with our schedule and need for some flexibility with children. I wonder what nurses do who have kids that get sick and do not have anyone else to care for them. I worked beside a nurses assistant who needed to take off for a medical issue, and they would not allow it since she had not been there for 90 days.

job_title: Medical Laboratory Technician (MLT) in Mayfield, KY
pros: Awesome coworkers and good learning environment.
cons: Some machines needs to be replaced

job_title: Mental Health Technician in Mayfield, KY
pros: Not one positive Is there.
cons: Toxic manager will harass employees manager is manipulative and does not care about patients or employees.

job_title: Licensed Practical Nurse in Paducah, KY
pros: Coworkers here make it bearable.
cons: No raise for the second year. Feels like administration doesn’t care.

review_title: Great co-workers but upper management is a joke
pros: Great Co Workers and atmosphere if you stay away from the "clique" which will be obvious you'll be fine hopefully, you stay away they talk you join you demean yourself.
cons: HR and CEO is a joke too many Indians trying to be Chiefs!!!! If you don't kiss butt not the place to be :(

pros: Close to home, good working environment
cons: Wages are not competitive with surrounding areas
